meanings.sent1: My friend is a savers and always puts money in the bank.
meanings.sent2: The savers at the bank help people manage their finances.
meanings.sent3: The savers in our family always have a little extra for treats.
meanings.sent4: She was a true savers, holding onto every penny like it was gold.
meanings.sent5: The savers squirrelled away their earnings for a rainy day.

meanings.definition: A device or system that saves something from danger or destruction.
meanings.sent1: The fire alarm is a savers, alerting us to danger.
meanings.sent2: Life jackets are important savers in case of a boat emergency.
meanings.sent3: The savers sprinkler system saved the building from burning down.
meanings.sent4: The savers airbag deployed just in time to protect the driver.
meanings.sent5: The savers backup generator kicked in during the power outage.

meanings.definition: The act of saving or preserving something.
meanings.sent1: Conservation is the savers of our environment.
meanings.sent2: The savers of historical artifacts ensures they are not lost to time.
meanings.sent3: The savers of old traditions keeps our culture alive.
meanings.sent4: The savers of memories in photographs captures moments forever.
meanings.sent5: The savers of energy helps reduce our impact on the planet.
